title: Live NRL: Panthers v Knights
text:
Live NRL: Penrith Panthers v Newcastle Knights scores, updates, blog March 24, 2017 3:47pm Source: FOX SPORTS TOUTED as premiership favourites in the pre-season, Penrith’s start to 2017 has been relatively underwhelming after one win from three starts. 
Their opponents on Friday night at Pepper Stadium, Newcastle, also have the same record to start the season. 
Match Centre: Panthers v Knights 
The Knights, who managed just one win last season, have been gallant in their three matches so the Panthers will have to be on their game if they’re to take home the two points. 
Live stream round four of the NRL premiership on FOX SPORTS. Get your free 2-week FOXTEL PLAY trial and start watching in minutes. SIGN UP NOW! 
In a blow for the home side, Bryce Cartwright has been ruled out as he battled an ankle injury, while the Knights have lost Brendan Elliot to concussion.
